title: CEO: The Disposition is More Important Than the Position, with Andy Frisella - 223
itunes:title: CEO: The Disposition is More Important Than the Position, with Andy Frisella - 223
description: Whenever I tell people that they need to carry themselves with confidence and act like the MFCEO of their own lives, I always get someone who says something like this: “That’s easy for you to say, Andy. Because you really are a CEO. It’s easy to walk around with some swag in life when you actually hold a position with some status.” They don’t get it. The disposition comes before the position. In this episode, I explain what that means and why it's critical to your success.
